posts.title: Getting Started with Web Development
posts.excerpt: Learn the basics of web development and start your journey as a developer.
posts.content:
Web development is an exciting field that combines creativity with technical skills. In this post, we'll explore the fundamental concepts you need to know to get started.

The Basics

To begin your web development journey, you'll need to understand three core technologies:

  • HTML for structure
  • CSS for styling
  • JavaScript for interactivity

Each of these technologies plays a crucial role in creating modern websites...
